Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Iwo akukufunsa iwe za katundu amene mumapeza mukamenya nkhondo. Nena: “Mwini wake wa katundu uyu ndi Mulungu ndi Mtumwi. Motero muopeni Mulungu ndipo yanjanani pakati panu ndipo mverani Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake ngati inu ndinu okhulupirira.”

Okhulupirira enieni ndi okhawo, amene ngati dzina la Mulungu litchulidwa, amachita mantha m’mitima mwawo ndipo pamene mavesi ake awerengedwa kwa iwo, iwo amaonjezera chikhulupiriro chawo ndipo amaika chikhulupiriro chawo mwa Ambuye wawo
Amene amapitiriza mapemphero ndipo amapereka mwaulere gawo lina la zinthu zimene tawapatsa
Iwo ndiwo amene ali okhulupirira enieni. Kwa iwo kuli maudindo olemekezeka amene ali ndi Ambuye wawo ndiponso chikhululukiro ndi mphotho yolemekezeka
Monga momwe Ambuye wako adakutulutsa m’nyumba yako ndi choonadi ndipo, ndithudi, gulu lina la okhulupirira sadakondwe ndi icho
Kutsutsana ndi iwe pa choonadi chimene chinadza ngati kuti iwo anali kuperekedwa ku imfa pamene iwo anali kuona

Ndi pamene Mulungu adalonjeza gulu lina pakati pa magulu awiri, ilo ndi lanu ndipo inu mudakonda kuti mukhale ndi gulu lija lopanda zida koma Mulungu adafuna kukwaniritsa chilungamo ndi mawu ake ndi kudula maziko ya anthu osakhulupirira
Kuti choonadi chikhoza kupambana ndi kuthetsa bodza ngakhale kuti anthu osakhulupirira anali kudana nazo
